summary: A simple change to the savior\'s hide enchantment to make it more suiting to a hunter.
descriptionHtml:
I have been looking for a way to contribute to this community, however small. And hopefully someone will enjoy this change.

I felt that the 15% magical resistance and 50% poison resistance was unfitting for a hunter. So i changed the enchantment to 20% bonus to both sneak and archery. I hoped to make the armor useful without being overpowered, but i am completely open to suggestions on what you think would be more fitting. 

Feel free to use my change in your mod if you like, no need to give me credit since it\'s a simple change to make.

Only use one version of the mod at a time, they are not stand alone.

1.00: 20% bonus to sneak and archery

1.00B: 35% to sneak and archery and a muffle effect
author: Sinkiri
